title: honor
body: Riot can you answer me ? At honor lvl two i got a lot of key fragments when i reached lvl 3 i got one honor capsule and that 2 or 3 week  0 key frags, When i reached honor lvl 4 i didnt got honor capsule and in 3 week h i think i got only 3 key frags . i am just wondering if you get honor capsule when you reach new honor lvl. Some of my firend got 3rd capsule and i got only one. I saw i dont have lock on my honor lvl so that means i can get rewards . {{champion:103}}

replies.body: Honor capsules are not a guaranteed drop for any specific rank, and you don't get one each time you rank up either. They're random drops that can replace a key fragment every once and awhile.
